trans-unit.source: Replaces one file with another file, and creates a backup copy of the original file

seg-source.mrk: Replaces one file with another file, and creates a backup copy of the original file

target.mrk: Replaces one file with another file, and creates a backup copy of the original file

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to be replaced.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the file to be replaced.

target.mrk: The name of the file to be replaced.

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that will replace the $sReplacedFile file.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the file that will replace the $sReplacedFile file.

target.mrk: The name of the file that will replace the $sReplacedFile file.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The name of the file that will serve as a backup copy of the $sReplacedFile file. If this

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The name of the file that will serve as a backup copy of the $sReplacedFile file.
If this

target.mrk: [optional]
The name of the file that will serve as a backup copy of the $sReplacedFile file.
If this

trans-unit.source: parameter is empty string, no backup file is created.

seg-source.mrk: parameter is empty string, no backup file is created.

target.mrk: parameter is empty string, no backup file is created.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The replacement options. This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The replacement options.
This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

target.mrk: [optional]
The replacement options.
This parameter can be one or more of the following values.

target.mrk: $REPLACEFILE_WRITE_THROUGH

trans-unit.source: True.

seg-source.mrk: True.

trans-unit.source: If this function fails, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() function to get extended error information. The following

The following

target.mrk: If this function fails, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() function to get extended error information.
The following

target.mrk: are possible error codes for this function.

trans-unit.source: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_MOVE_REPLACEMENT (1176)

seg-source.mrk: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_MOVE_REPLACEMENT (1176)

target.mrk: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_MOVE_REPLACEMENT (1176)

trans-unit.source: The replacement file could not be renamed. If $sBackupFile was specified, the replaced and replacement files

seg-source.mrk: The replacement file could not be renamed.
If $sBackupFile was specified, the replaced and replacement files

target.mrk: The replacement file could not be renamed.
If $sBackupFile was specified, the replaced and replacement files

trans-unit.source: retain their original file names. Otherwise, the replaced file no longer exists and the replacement file exists

seg-source.mrk: retain their original file names.
Otherwise, the replaced file no longer exists and the replacement file exists

target.mrk: retain their original file names.
Otherwise, the replaced file no longer exists and the replacement file exists

trans-unit.source: under its original name.

target.mrk: under its original name.

target.mrk: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_MOVE_REPLACEMENT_2 (1177)

trans-unit.source: The replacement file could not be moved. The replacement file still exists under its original name; however,

seg-source.mrk: The replacement file could not be moved.
The replacement file still exists under its original name; however,

target.mrk: The replacement file could not be moved.
The replacement file still exists under its original name; however,

trans-unit.source: it has inherited the file streams and attributes from the file it is replacing. The file to be replaced still

The file to be replaced still

target.mrk: it has inherited the file streams and attributes from the file it is replacing.
The file to be replaced still

seg-source.mrk: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_REMOVE_REPLACED (1175)

target.mrk: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_REMOVE_REPLACED (1175)

trans-unit.source: The replaced file could not be deleted. The replaced and replacement files retain their original file names.

seg-source.mrk: The replaced file could not be deleted.
The replaced and replacement files retain their original file names.

target.mrk: The replaced file could not be deleted.
The replaced and replacement files retain their original file names.

trans-unit.source: If any other error is returned, such as ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER (87), the replaced and replacement files will

target.mrk: If any other error is returned, such as ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER (87), the replaced and replacement files will

trans-unit.source: retain their original file names. In this scenario, a backup file does not exist and it is not guaranteed

In this scenario, a backup file does not exist and it is not guaranteed

In this scenario, a backup file does not exist and it is not guaranteed
